name: HIV1
title: HIV 1
description: May contain obsolete codes for use with measures with long look-back periods.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for a diagnosis of  human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) type 1.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a diagnosis of HIV type 1 or acquired immunodeficiency syndrome.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent HIV type 2.)
